title: CORRIGENDA
html:
CORRIGENDA

A friend pointed out, much to my chagrin, that I erroneously credit “Stan Cartman” with having an Aunt Flo in the menstruation euphemisms article in VERBATIM XXV/1. There is no Stan Cartman on South Park—Stan's last name is Marsh, and Cartman's first name is Eric. I got only the Stan part right.

Jessy Randall
